@Ari59886250 Hi @Ari59886250 please do not hesitate to send us a DM should you required further assistance or clarification. For more info about AAX travel voucher and its T&C, you can refer to https://t.co/dZQokxiGMJ for your guide. We thank you for your continued support. - Chloe

urls.title: How do I change my flight date or time?
urls.description: What are the conditions? You can change the time or date of your booking but change fee and fare difference may apply on top of the price you have paid in your purchase earlier. Once a booking number has been issued, flight changes are subject to the following terms: Inside of forty-eight (48) hours prior to the scheduled flight departure time, no changes are allowed. The charges for flight change outside of forty-eight (48) hours prior to the scheduled flight departure time are provided for here,

data.text: @Ahmore15 We noted your concern @Ahmore15, however, any changes to the flight after the booking is confirmed will occur some fees (change fees and fare difference). You can manage your booking by following the steps on link https://t.co/7Sq7um2WZP. Thank you -irwan

@Aizat_azam Hi @Aizat_azam,  Our sincerest apologies for the delay and inconvenience. We've forwarded the request again to a relevant team to process it accordingly. You will be updated as soon as possible once it's processed and completed. Thank you very much for your patience -Rob
@PKTan3 Hi @PKTan3 thank you for contacting us! Can we have your case number (Login Super App > Account > My Cases) for further checking please? Thank you. - Chloe
@shaktianaibela Hi @shaktianaibela thank you for contacting us! We have responded to your DM, you may check your inbox for your perusal. Thank you and have a nice day! - Chloe

@nrenyaj Hi @nrenyaj we are sorry for that. You may opt to move your flight nearest to your flight time/date FOC. Just refer to the email notification we have sent you for guide or approach Allstars at airport counter for immediate assistance. Thank you for your continued support. - Chloe

urls.title: Super Ride Participation Interest Form
urls.description: Thank you for your interest. Get quizzed on your trip! Each correct answer will earn you a spin for exciting prizes. Fill out the information below and stand a chance to get on Super Ride! Locations: 🚗 Klang Valley (KL Sentral) 27 August 2022 | 10am - 4pm [FULL] 🚗 Penang Island (Queensbay Mall) 3 September 2022 | 10am - 4pm 🚗 Johor Bahru (Paradigm Mall Johor Bahru) 10 September 2022 | 10am - 4pm *Only one (1) participants per Super Ride at one (1) time. Remarks: 1. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted, maximum of 5 participants will be chosen at random for each location to join us! 2. Closer to actual event we will send out a final registration asking you to confirm attendance.

data.text:
ILOVEMY — That’s it. That’s the promo code to get RM5 OFF when you ride with us for the very first time. Beep beep! 🚗 🚗 🚗 

#airasiaride https://t.co/D3fsRkb7iw

Have you heard? You can fall in love with #Perth’s Greatest Works of Art ✨🎸🇦🇺 

Some must-visit spots:
📍 Blue Boat House
📍 Pink Lake
📍 The Pinnacles Desert
📍 Rottnest Island (and say hi to our quokka friends!)

#AirAsiaX #travel https://t.co/dHCtAxIbXe

urls.title: airasia food | Online Food Delivery In Malaysia | More Food For Everyone
urls.description: Order the best food & beverages from top restaurants and cafes near you with airasia food online delivery service. Affordable, cheap, and discounted prices from a wide range of cuisines.

urls.title: AirAsia partners Penang Global Tourism to further elevate Penang as region’s preferred tourism destination — airasia newsroom
urls.description: AirAsia and Penang Global Tourism (PGT) today signed a memorandum of collaboration (MOC) to elevate Penang as a preferred tourism destination in the region.

data.text:
AirAsia and Penang Global Tourism collaborate to further elevate #Penang as the region’s preferred tourism destination! ✈️

Tap here to read the full story: https://t.co/TrvE5bwANo https://t.co/QDRuLpeI0z
